page.title: 06SOUTHGATES STABLES
page.content: In 1904 Lord Fairhaven opened South- gates training school.At Southgates they have 26 horses.14 there,8 at Town Green and 4 at Burnham and other farms.After we saw the horses we asked to look at the carriages and there were 9 of them.Some of the carriages were very old.The oldest carriage is called the Landau and was built in 1880.The newest was built in 1913 and it is called the Charabanc.5 people look after the horses and there is one person to 5 horses.The largest horse is 17 hands and the smallest is 9 hands.He is a Shetland Pony.The oldest horse is 20 and the oldest pony is 46. The most expensive horses are the Australian cow ponies and they have got a stallion.Some breeds of horses are the Australian cow ponies,Shetland and Argentinians.
